message.entry: Unable to verify Ocean Optics OmniDriver installation
MATLAB must be restarted to complete the OceanOptics driver configuration
Select the directory where OmniDriver is installed

Cannot connect to instrument. Possible reasons include: You may not have the required Ocean Optics Jar file installed. Download it from: www.mathworks.com/oceanopticsdriver. Your javaclasspath.txt or javalibrarypath.txt may not be configured correctly to load the driver. To fix them, execute 'configureOceanOpticsDriver' at the MATLAB command line.
Spectrometer not detected. A possible reason for this is the spectrometer is not properly connected to the computer.
